name: Fish In The Sea
description:
Maneuver through an underwater cavern while collecting crystals. What started as a simple collection mission turns into much more, as there is something else in the waters with you.

All art and code were produced by me for this jam. Some sound effects were created by me, and many were altered sounds from https://freesound.org/.

Ambient noise:
Music: The Dread by Kevin MacLeod 
Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4491-the-dread
License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
Artist website: https://incompetech.com/
